summary:
**Yu-Gi-Oh!** is a Japanese manga series by Kazuki Takahashi, published from 1996 to 2004. It follows Yugi Mutou, a boy who solves an ancient puzzle and gains a gaming alter-ego. The story mainly focuses on a card game called Duel Monsters, where players battle with fantasy monsters.

The manga inspired a popular media franchise, including anime series, video games, and a real-life trading card game. The franchise has been very successful and is one of the highest-grossing of all time.
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
